about_the_game:
Key Features:

  • Advanced AI for some NPCs:

    Some NPCs will interact with the world, and enemies will remember your fighting style and spells during long battles. If a common townsperson or traveler dies, your connection with them will be lost forever.

  • Revolutionary Magic System:

    A new, interactive way to cast spells that enhances immersion.

  • Engaging Storyline:

    Follow a compelling plot with unique characters and exciting events.

  • Impact of Choice:

    Your decisions will significantly influence the storyline and changes in the world, ensuring a unique experience with each new playthrough.

  • Diverse Magic Spells:

    Discover and master a variety of spells to shape your magical persona.

  • Character Upgrades:

    Upgrade your character to match your play style.

  • Optimized Assets:

    Enjoy high-quality visuals with all assets meticulously optimized for the best performance.

In the cities, in addition to rulers, the strongest mages are revered. While some try to fill their pockets with gold, the poor in villages fight goblins who raid and steal women for breeding. Meanwhile, orcs and other foul creatures have suddenly started prowling around castles. Amidst this chaos, you must save your family. But don't forget that people have begun waging war against each other, and someone has mastered forbidden dark magic, summoning something terrible...

Become the greatest mage, master a multitude of combinable spells, defend or siege castles, and follow the captivating story of a character whose main priority is the well-being of their family.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT

short_description: An RPG featuring advanced AI for select NPCs--- While the rich fight for power, goblins raid villages and abduct women for reproduction. Your choices can change this world. In this captivating story, you will become a wizard and save your family.
